name: Darkard
description:
Accessible card game for blind people.

It's gameplay is entirely based on sounds, with each card being a different sound. Your objective is to fool your opponent while trying to predict which card he will play in the next round. At first glance it looks like a game of chance, but soon the mind games begin.

Support the project
